titles.title: A bill to reduce temporarily the duty on Butylated reaction product of p-cresol and DCPD (dicyclopentadiene).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce temporarily the duty on Butylated reaction product of p-cresol and DCPD (dicyclopentadiene).
